themidibus

Interface ObjectMidiListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MidiListener

    public interface ObjectMidiListener
extends MidiListener
    A ObjectMidiListener can be notified of incomming NoteOn, NoteOff and ControllerChange events via Note and ControlChange objects, usually by a MidiBus object which it is connected to. Typically it would analyse and react to incomming messages in some useful way.
    Version:
    008
    Author:
    Severin Smith, Marc Koderer
    See Also:
    MidiListener, RawMidiListener, SimpleMidiListener, StandardMidiListener, Note, ControlChange, MidiBus
